input.sentences: today was i went to a classic car show . they had so many generations of cars there .
the first thing i noticed was how nice and clean all the cars looked . even the rims were sparkling .
the second thing i oticed was how nice the insides of the cars were . they did not even look like they were from the past .
a cop showed up half way thru the show . just in case anyone got too rowdy .
my favorite car was the pretty red one i seen at the end . it looked likemsowthing [male] bond would have drove .
output.sentences: These days cars are simply not as elegant as classic models from prior generations.
They gleamed bright in the summer sun from the sparkling paint and shiny rims.
The real focus was the luxuriously nice interiors of generations' past cars.
That didn't stop young men from becoming rowdy, street-racing, and getting into some trouble with a cop or two.
The most popular color during these times were the vibrantly pretty red colors, having been associated with the dominant male figure of the times.
